import React, { useContext} from 'react'; import "./Cartpage.css"; import { StoreContext } from '../../context/Storecontext'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Cartpage = () => { const { cartItems, removeFromCart, food_list,getTotalCartAmount,url } = useContext(StoreContext); const navigate=useNavigate(); return (

Items

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove


{food_list.map((item, index) => { if (cartItems[item._id] > 0) { return (

{item.name}

${item.price}

{cartItems[item._id]}

${item.price * cartItems[item._id]}

{ removeFromCart(item._id) }}>x

) } return null; })}

Cart Totals

SubTotal

${getTotalCartAmount()}

Delivery Fee

${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:10}

Total ${getTotalCartAmount()===0?0:getTotalCartAmount()+10}

If you have a promo code,enter it here

); } export default Cartpage;
